RelatedSentence: On Saturday , May 17 , 2014 at 9:55 p.m. Officers responded to the 6400 block of Panama Lane concerning an injury collision involving a pedestrian .

A1: Maninder Singh 24 , of Bakersfield was crossing southbound
RelatedSentence: Investigation revealed Maninder Singh 24 , of Bakersfield was crossing southbound , outside a marked crosswalk , when he was struck by a gray Lexus , which was being driven eastbound on Panama Lane by Ruben Robles 46 , also of Bakersfield .

RelatedSentence: Singh sustained moderate injuries as a result of the collision and was transported to a local hospital for treatment .
Anyone with information regarding this collision is encouraged to call the Bakersfield Police Department at ( 661 ) 327-7111 .
